CustomField.formula: if(BEGINS(OwnerId, '00G'), if(BEGINS(Owner:Queue.QueueName, 'AMS'), 'TechnologyOne Application Managed Services' , 'TechnologyOne Support Centre'), if(Case_Owner_Reporting_Tags__c == 'AMS', 'TechnologyOne Application Managed Services' , 'TechnologyOne Support Centre'))
CustomField.label: EmailSig
